name: Spoken English in Hindi
description: 1) Formulas.  * Learn English by using formulas (Ex: Sub + H.V + V1 + ing + Obj).  * First learn 12 formulas then convert those as 48 formulas. * Up to 300 formulas  * Best way to learn English according to English Grammar * This formulas covers Grammar part also. * Each formula has a description in Hindi about usage of formula. * For each formula has been given up to 10 examples in English to Hindi.  2) More...  * Conversations. * Graphic line draws to understand about tenses. * Practice test papers. * 2D Images for better understand formula.
